block.artifality.artifact_upgrader.descr:
Allows you to upgrade your artifact,
fill with 2 Incremental Blocks to
upgrade to tier 2, or with
Nether Star for tier 3.
block.artifality.crystal_heart_lens.desc:
Gives additional 10 hearts to players
in radius of beacon if placed
on top of the beacon.
block.artifality.incremental_lens.descri:
Increases the level of effect
given by the beacon if placed
on top of the beacon.
block.artifality.lunar_crystal_lens.desc:
Gives glowing effect to players
in radius of beacon if placed
on top of the beacon.
enchantment.artifality.lunar_damage.desc:
Increases melee damage by
decreasing attack speed.
enchantment.artifality.sliding_curse.des:
Makes you slide on all
blocks like on ice.
item.artifality.invisibility_cape.descri:
Makes the wearer invisible
while sneaking, also
hides the worn armor.
item.artifality.living_heart.description:
When used, gives additional heart,
resets after death.
item.artifality.regeneration_ring.descri:
Gives the wearer regeneration
once per minute.
item.artifality.ukulele.description:
When used, creates a cloud with
a random positive effect under the
player, and if equipped on the
back, creates a cloud with a random
negative effect under the attacker.
Cooldown: 20 sec
item.artifality.zeus_staff.description:
Summons lightning at the target point,
also neutralizes lightning damage
while in the main hand.
